section.title: Icons Description
section.p: 'Version': Select the version of the test case that you would like to view from the dropdown list. Versions can be incremented by passing a review. The system will create a new version when the user clicks edit.
'Send For Review': Send test case for review.

section.title: Comments, Test Campaign and Copy Link Icons
section.p: 'Copy Link (Latest Version)': Copies a link to the latest version of this Test Case to the clipboard.
'Show Test Campaigns': Shows all Test Campaigns associated with this Test Case.
'Show Comments': Shows all comments associated with this Test Case. Additional Test Case comments can also be added here.

section.title: Test Case Details
section.p: This form shows the detailed information for the currently selected Test Case.

section.title: Test Steps
section.p: Ordered list of Actions against the SUT with Validation of responses.
